import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import './HomeEnhanced.css'; import IconBook from '../assets/icons/book.svg'; import IconCart from '../assets/icons/cart.svg'; import IconDelivery from '../assets/icons/delivery.svg'; import IconStar from '../assets/icons/star.svg'; import { useState } from "react"; const HomeEnhanced = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const featuredGenres = [ { name: 'Academic', icon: IconBook, description: 'Essential textbooks and academic resources' }, { name: 'Fiction', icon: IconBook, description: 'Captivating stories and novels' }, { name: 'Science', icon: IconStar, description: 'Scientific discoveries and research' }, { name: 'Technology', icon: IconStar, description: 'Latest in tech and programming' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '50,000+', label: 'Books Available' }, { number: '25,000+', label: 'Happy Students' }, { number: '500+', label: 'Universities Served' }, { number: '15+', label: 'Years of Excellence' } ]; const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMobileMenu = () => setMobileMenuOpen(open => !open); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to Snuggle Read

Your Premier University E-Commerce Bookstore

Your cozy university bookstore — where learning meets comfort! Discover academic and leisure books to fuel your journey.

Explore Books {!user && ( Join Now )}
Free Campus Delivery
Student Discounts
Digital & Physical Books
{/* hero-books.jpg was missing from public/images; use existing bookshelf-small.jpg to avoid proxy errors */}
{/* Vision & Mission Section */}

About Snuggle Read

Empowering Education Through Knowledge

Our Vision

To be the leading university bookstore that bridges the gap between students and knowledge, making quality educational resources accessible to every learner across South Africa and beyond.

Our Mission

We provide a comprehensive e-commerce platform offering academic books, textbooks, and educational materials to university students, faculty, and researchers, with exceptional service and competitive prices.

Our Values

  • Academic Excellence
  • Student-First Service
  • Innovation in Learning
  • Accessibility for All
  • Trust & Reliability
{/* What Makes Us Special */}

What Makes Snuggle Read Special?

Your University E-Commerce Bookstore Experience

University Focused

Specifically curated for university students, faculty, and academic institutions with specialized collections for different fields of study.

E-Commerce Excellence

Seamless online shopping experience with advanced search, filtering, and recommendation systems tailored for academic needs.

Multi-Campus Reach

Serving multiple universities and campuses across South Africa with localized inventory and campus-specific collections.

Student Benefits

Exclusive student discounts, flexible payment options, textbook rental programs, and special academic pricing.

{/* Featured Genres */}

Explore Our Book Categories

Discover knowledge across all disciplines

{featuredGenres.map((genre, index) => (

{genre.name}

{genre.description}

Explore → ))}
{/* Statistics Section */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.number}
{stat.label}
))}
{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Start Your Learning Journey?

Join thousands of students who trust Snuggle Read for their academic needs

Browse Books Now {!user && ( Create Account )}
); }; export default HomeEnhanced;
